description: Combine thin rice stick noodles, salad, chilli, coriander and fried shallots, then toss with a delicious Vietnamese dressing for a quick and easy salad.
name: Vietnamese Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using the mandoline slicer, slice cucumber into thin rounds. Drain carrot mixture. Arrange lettuce and noodles on 4 serving plates. Top with cucumber, carrot and coriander. Drizzle with dressing and sprinkle with chilli and fried shallots. Serve.
